newsitem.title: MALAYSIA: DRB-Hicom to brief investment community.
newsitem.headline: DRB-Hicom to brief investment community.

text.p: The DRB-Hicom group said it will brief bankers, analysts and fund managers at a meeting on Friday to discuss its future direction following the death of chairman Yahaya Ahmad.
The group held a news conference on Thursday at which it announced that deputy chairman Saleh Sulong would replace Yayaha, who died on Monday in a helicopter crash.
In an advisory released by the heavy industrial and transportation group on Friday, DRB-Hicom said the meeting with the investment community will be held at 6:00 p.m. local time (1000 GMT).
Proton Bhd, the national carmaker, is also part of the DRB-Hicom group.
Nine companies related to Yahaya and the DRB-Hicom group were suspended on Tuesday following news of the death, and will be requoted on Monday.
